rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious foyer with built-in storage and a small sitting area.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open plan living space with floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light. Designed in Colonial style with vintage colonial detailing.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen and connected via a corridor to the main living area. Features large window openings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern Colonial styled kitchen with an island counter and floor-to-ceiling windows in the dining/living extension area.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible from living areas for convenience of guests, designed with traditional finishes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. Incorporates Vastu principles for bedroom placement.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed in Colonial style with floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom featuring ample natural light and traditional colonial decor.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace designed with minimal distractions. Located away from noisy areas to maintain productivity.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for the guest bedrooms.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment room featuring high-end audio-visual systems and comfortable seating. Designed with acoustics in mind.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with floor-to-ceiling windows and colonial detailing.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Another bedroom ensuring sufficient natural light and privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom 2
rooms.description: Private ensuite for one of the upper bedrooms.
